The FTC should investigate if hiding Free File is unfair & deceptive, and if the companies colluded to rip off taxpayers. It’s unfair & deceptive. https://www.propublica.org/article/turbotax-deliberately-hides-its-free-file-page-from-search-engines …

The IRS’s Free File program claims to provide free tax prep services to 70% of taxpayers. Today I’m reintroducing the US Territorial Relief Act to give US territories like Puerto Rico a route to comprehensive debt relief & a chance to get back on their feet. Our fellow US citizens are counting on us, & we cannot forget them. https://www.elnuevodia.com/noticias/eeuu/nota/warrenyvelazquezinsistenencancelargranpartedeladeudapublicadepuertorico-2491511/ …

Now, post-Maria, Puerto Rico faces a much bigger crisis. Rebuilding efforts in Puerto Rico are still slow, & the debt is a big reason why. Few investors want to put money into reconstruction if the debt means the island doesn’t have a realistic chance of recovering.

Puerto Rico was in crisis long before Hurricanes Maria & Irma tore through the island. For years, Puerto Rico has been at the mercy of Wall Street vulture funds that snapped up the island’s crushing debt to squeeze the Puerto Rican people for every penny they can get. pic.twitter.com/AHCx44cOI3
